name: F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn
description:
F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn is an action-shooter game developed by Monolith Productions. It was originally released in 2009. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn has a score of 57. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn is available on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
